full_summary:
================================__()

### Title
#### Request for Individual Regional Standing Offer for Hygiene Papers
================================ наче–

[**Solicitation Number:**] WS3591134913

[Solicitation Date: 04 October 2022](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Request Title
[**English Request Title:**] Provision and Delivery of Toilet and Hand Papers for Correctional Service Canada Institutions in Quebec
[**Français Request Title:**] Fourniture et livraison de papiers hygiéniques et à mains pour les établissements du Service correctionnel du Canada au Québec

### Information about the Request
================================<bool>
#### General Information
We are seeking bids for a Request for Individual Regional Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision and delivery of various toilet paper and hand paper towels to Correctional Service Canada institutions across Quebec. This is a requirement for supplying and delivering the materials as needed across the province.

#### Key Details
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None

#### Important Dates
* **Tender Closing Date**: 1 November 2022
* **Amendment Date**: 31 October 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 1 September 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A

#### Regional and Language Representation

This customer is for supply to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC). If a bidder is not fluent in English or French, they must provide official certification of their translator and demands for thorough utilization support not less than 180 pages which represent both languages.

### Trade Agreements
================================<bool>
This request is open to bidders who are eligible to participate under the following trade agreements:
* [**Canada – Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)](http://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/gdt/japan-japon/index.aspx)
* [**World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)](http://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/gdt/gdt-annonce_disponibilit.aspx)
* [**Canada–Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)](http://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/gdt/mexico-mexique.aspx)
* [**Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement](http://www.international.gc.ca/trade
